comments:
note the problem occurred with 20050106 only. i tested it on 20050105, and everything was fine.

steps to reproduce:

   - setup the scripting environnment using attached files
   - select the data set from the data explorer
   - right click the data set, and choose Edit
   - Preview Results

expected behavior:

   - events are executed, and data are listed.

actual behavior:

   - nothing happened.

Created an attachment (id=32570)
the report design

Created an attachment (id=32571)
data source class

Created an attachment (id=32572)
data set class
i tested it in debugging mode as well, nothing was printed in the console, it seemed these two classes were not called at all.

You need to bind the data set to an element for the script to be executed. This makes sense since it doesn't make sense to open and run the data set if there is no binding to any element. If I bind it to an element the scripts are executed, so I set this bug to invalid.

i bind the scripted data set to a table, and previewed the report, i got the following errors,

There are errors on the report page:

tested on the new build, the regression problem i saw the other day was gone.
